name: Perseverance (itch) (Garnet)
description:
Perseverance

Perseverance follows the story of the Opportunity Rover famously known for being on Mars for many years, eventually powering down due to technical and environmental issues. The story takes a different turn when the new Rover (Perseverance) gets to Mars (accurate to the dates), and instead explores Mars, eventually finding the powered down Opportunity. Perseverance then powers him up and the two begin a new adventure together.

This was a project completed as part of my 3D Animation class. It was mostly an exploration of Unity's in-built High-Definition Rendering Pipeline that I was interested in trying out to achieve a high quality sequence. As this is the case, it does take a beefy Computer to be able to run it effectively without too many bugs with regards to the audio/animation occurring.

I will include a link to a YouTube video with the animation sequence itself to save the trouble of downloading and running it.
